content: {"name": "Playstreet 4800 N Fairhill St.", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.phila.gov/programs/playstreets/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4813 N Fairhill St.", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19120", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.02481688943771, "longitude": -75.1340770139983}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 685-2719", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Program runs 6/21/22 to 8/26/22"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}]}
